text: Ebiamulaamanga bilali Nyasaye, ni amera butwsa kamwaraho enywe nende bapapa benyu, Nyasaye shiyeshiakhwo eshimanyisio shiosi khwako tawe. Ne okhubusia khwosi nikhwa Nyasaye butswa, yalomesia mbu mulalaama shiosi shiosi halaliye, eyo niyo idini yalunjikha. Halali Abandu abanji shibamanyile tawe
